clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: Multiple hypermetabolic lesions in bones, suggestive of metastases.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Focal increased uptake in left lung lower lobe, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
